channel.title: A couple of RuneJava 3.0b Problems
channel.description:
Well, i am useing the newest runejava, 3.0b. Now, when i range, its perfect [b]except[/b] It is always either 1 or 0, no matter what level you are, or bow and arrows you are using. How can i fix?
#2. When it attacks, its very slow. You will hit once(the animation will display) And youll attack more but no animation will be displayed, and then in 10secs, it displays once more. How can i fix that? Any help is very much appreitaited Thanks!

item.title: A couple of RuneJava 3.0b Problems
item.dc:creator: @gio2 gio2
item.description:
@gio2 wrote:

Well, i am useing the newest runejava, 3.0b.
Now, when i range, its perfect except It is always either 1 or 0, no matter what level you are, or bow and arrows you are using. How can i fix?

#2.
When it attacks, its very slow. You will hit once(the animation will display) And youll attack more but no animation will be displayed, and then in 10secs, it displays once more. How can i fix that?
Any help is very much appreitaited
Thanks!
